analyzed: tasmai etat provāca vedān chandāṃsi savituḥ vareṇyam

original: (GBr_1,1.33b) yatra hy eva manas tad vāg yatra vai vāk tan mana iti_

original: (GBr_1,1.33e) yatra hy evāgnis tat pṛthivī yatra vai pṛthivī tad agnir iti_

original: (GBr_1,1.33h) yatra hy eva vāyus tad antarikṣaṃ yatra vā antarikṣaṃ tad vāyur iti_
analyzed: yatra hi eva vāyuḥ tat antarikṣam yatra vai antarikṣam tat vāyuḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,1.33k) yatra hy evādityas tad dyaur yatra vai dyaus tad āditya iti_

original: (GBr_1,1.33w) yatra hy evābhraṃ tad varṣaṃ yatra vai varṣaṃ tad abhram iti_
analyzed: yatra hi eva abhram tat varṣam yatra vai varṣam tat abhram iti

(GBr_1,1.33ff) yatra hy eva vedās tac chandāṃsi yatra vai chandāṃsi tad vedā iti_
analyzed: yatra hi eva vedāḥ tat chandāṃsi yatra vai chandāṃsi tat vedāḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,1.33kk) etad dha smaitad vidvāṃsam opākārim āsastur brahmacārī te saṃsthita ity athaita āsastur ācita iva cito babhūva_
analyzed: etat ha sma etat vidvāṃsam opākārim āsastuḥ brahmacārī te saṃsthitaḥ iti atha ete āsastuḥ ācitaḥ iva citaḥ babhūva

original: (GBr_1,1.33ll) athotthāya prāvrājīd ity etad vā ahaṃ veda naitāsu yoniṣv ita etebhyo vā mithunebhyaḥ saṃbhūto brahmacārī mama purāyuṣaḥ preyād  #
analyzed: atha utthāya prāvrājīt iti etat vai aham veda na etāsu yoniṣu itas etebhyaḥ vā mithunebhyaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ brahmacārī mama purā āyuṣaḥ preyāt  /

original: (GBr_1,1.34a) brahma hedaṃ śriyaṃ pratiṣṭhām āyatanam aikṣata
analyzed: brahma ha idam śriyam pratiṣṭhām āyatanam aikṣata

original: (GBr_1,1.34c) yadi tad vrate dhriyeta tat satye pratyatiṣṭhat
analyzed: yadi tat vrate dhriyeta tat satye pratyatiṣṭhat

original: (GBr_1,1.34d) sa savitā sāvitryā brāhmaṇaṃ sṛṣṭvā tat savitrīṃ paryadadhāt
analyzed: sa savitā sāvitryā brāhmaṇam sṛṣṭvā tat savitrīm paryadadhāt

original: (GBr_1,1.34e) tat savitur vareṇyam iti sāvitryāḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ [ed. savitryāḥ]
analyzed: tat savituḥ vareṇyam iti sāvitryāḥ prathamaḥ pādaḥ ā id savitryāḥ

original: (GBr_1,1.34s) aśūnyo bhavaty avichinno bhavaty avichinno 'sya tantur avichinnaṃ jīvanaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃvidvān evam etaṃ sāvitryāḥ  #
analyzed: a śūnyaḥ bhavati a vichinnaḥ bhavati a vichinnaḥ asya tantuḥ a vichinnam jīvanam bhavati yaḥ evam veda yaḥ ca evaṃvidvān evam etam sāvitryāḥ

original: (GBr_1,1.35a) bhargo devasya dhīmahīti sāvitryā dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ_
analyzed: bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi iti sāvitryāḥ dvitīyaḥ pādaḥ

original: (GBr_1,1.35o) aśūnyo bhavaty avichinno bhavaty avichinno 'sya tantur avichinnaṃ jīvanaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃvidvān evam etaṃ sāvitryā  #
analyzed: a śūnyaḥ bhavati a vichinnaḥ bhavati a vichinnaḥ asya tantuḥ a vichinnam jīvanam bhavati yaḥ evam veda yaḥ ca evaṃvidvān evam etam sāvitryā

original: (GBr_1,1.36a) dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayād iti sāvitryās tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ_
analyzed: dhiyaḥ yaḥ naḥ pracodayāt iti sāvitryāḥ tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ

original: (GBr_1,1.36o) aśūnyo bhavaty avichinno bhavaty avichinno 'sya tantur avichinnaṃ jīvanaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃvidvān evam etaṃ sāvitryās  #
analyzed: a śūnyaḥ bhavati a vichinnaḥ bhavati a vichinnaḥ asya tantuḥ a vichinnam jīvanam bhavati yaḥ evam veda yaḥ ca evaṃvidvān evam etam sāvitryāḥ

original: (GBr_1,1.37a) tena ha vā evaṃviduṣā brāhmaṇena brahmābhipannaṃ grasitaṃ parāmṛṣṭam_
analyzed: tena ha vai evaṃviduṣā brāhmaṇena brahma abhipannam grasitam parāmṛṣṭam
vedaiḥ yajñaḥ abhipannaḥ grasitaḥ parāmṛṣṭaḥ ā id parimṛṣṭaḥ

original: (GBr_1,1.37m) tāni ha vā etāni dvādaśamahābhūtāny evaṃvidi pratiṣṭhitāni
analyzed: tāni ha vai etāni dvādaśa mahābhūtāni evaṃvidi pratiṣṭhitāni

original: (GBr_1,1.38a) taṃ ha smaitam evāṃvidvāṃso manyante vidmainam iti yāthātathyam avidvāṃsaḥ_
analyzed: tam ha sma etam eva am vidvāṃsaḥ manyante vidma enam iti yāthātathyam a vidvāṃsaḥ

original: (GBr_1,1.38n) yo ha vā evaṃvit sa brahmavit
analyzed: yaḥ ha vai evaṃvid sa brahma vid

original: (GBr_1,1.38o) puṇyāṃ ca kīrtiṃ labhate surabhīṃś ca gandhān_
analyzed: puṇyām ca kīrtim labhate surabhīn ca gandhān

original: (GBr_1,1.38q) anantāṃ śriyam aśnute ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃvidvān evam etāṃ vedānāṃ mātaraṃ sāvitrīṃ saṃpadam upaniṣadam upāsta iti brāhmaṇam
analyzed: anantām śriyam aśnute yaḥ evam veda yaḥ ca evaṃvidvān evam etām vedānām mātaram sāvitrīm saṃpadam upaniṣadam upāste iti brāhmaṇam

original: (GBr_1,1.39i) upasādya yajuṣoddhṛtya mantrān prayujyāvasāya prācīḥ śākhāḥ saṃdhāya
analyzed: upasādya yajuṣā uddhṛtya mantrān prayujya avasāya prācīḥ śākhāḥ saṃdhāya

original: niraṅguṣṭhe pāṇāv amṛtam asy amṛtopastaraṇam asy amṛtāya tvopastṛṇāmīti pāṇāv udakam
analyzed: niraṅguṣṭhe pāṇau amṛtam asi amṛtopastaraṇam asi amṛtāya tvā upastṛṇāmi iti pāṇau udakam

original: (GBr_1,1.39j) sa yat pūrvam ācāmati sapta prāṇāṃs tān etenāsminn āpyāyayati
analyzed: sa yat pūrvam ācāmati sapta prāṇān tān etena asmin āpyāyayati

original: (GBr_1,1.39k) yā hy emā bāhyāḥ śarīrān mātrās tad yathaitad agniṃ vāyum ādityaṃ candramasam apaḥ paśūn anyāṃś ca prajās tān etenāsminn āpyāyayati_
analyzed: yāḥ hi ā imāḥ bāhyāḥ śarīrāt mātrāḥ tat yathā etat agnim vāyum ādityam candramasam apaḥ paśūn anyān ca prajāḥ tān etena asmin āpyāyayati

original: (GBr_1,1.39m) sa yad dvitīyam ācāmati saptāpānāṃs tān etenāsminn āpyāyayati
analyzed: sa yat dvitīyam ācāmati sapta apānān tān etena asmin āpyāyayati

original: (GBr_1,1.39n) yā hy emā bāhyāḥ śarīrān mātrās tad yathaitat paurṇamāsīm aṣṭakām amāvāsyāṃ śraddhāṃ dīkṣāṃ yajñaṃ dakṣiṇās tān etenāsminn āpyāyayati_
analyzed: yāḥ hi ā imāḥ bāhyāḥ śarīrāt mātrāḥ tat yathā etat paurṇamāsīm aṣṭakām amāvāsyām śraddhām dīkṣām yajñam dakṣiṇāḥ tān etena asmin āpyāyayati

original: (GBr_1,1.39p) sa yat tṛtīyam ācāmati sapta vyānāṃs tān etenāsminn āpyāyayati
analyzed: sa yat tṛtīyam ācāmati sapta vyānān tān etena asmin āpyāyayati

original: (GBr_1,1.39q) yā hy emā bāhyāḥ śarīrān mātrās tad yathaitat pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ divam_
analyzed: yāḥ hi ā imāḥ bāhyāḥ śarīrāt mātrāḥ tat yathā etat pṛthivīm antarikṣam divam

original: (GBr_1,1.39r) nakṣatrāṇy ṛtūn ārtavān saṃvatsarāṃs tān etenāsminn āpyāyayati_
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇi ṛtūn ārtavān saṃvatsarān tān etena asmin āpyāyayati

original: (GBr_1,1.39u) athāpriyanigamo bhavati tasmād vai vidvān puruṣam idaṃ puṇḍarīkam iti [ed. athāprīṃgnigamo,
analyzed: atha apriya nigamaḥ bhavati tasmāt vai vidvān puruṣam idam puṇḍarīkam iti ā id atha aprīṃgnigamaḥ

original: (GBr_1,1.39v) prāṇa eṣa sa puri śete saṃpuri śeta iti
analyzed: prāṇaḥ eṣa sa puri śete saṃpuri śete iti

original: (GBr_1,1.39w) puriśayaṃ santaṃ prāṇaṃ puruṣa ity ācakṣate parokṣeṇa
analyzed: puriśayam santam prāṇam puruṣaḥ iti ācakṣate parokṣeṇa

original: (GBr_1,1.39x) parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ
analyzed: parokṣa priyāḥ iva hi devāḥ bhavanti pratyakṣa dviṣaḥ

analyzed: sa yat pūrvam ācāmati purastāddhomān tena asmin avarunddhe

original: (GBr_1,1.39z) sa yad dvitīyam ācāmaty ājyabhāgau tenāsminn avarunddhe
analyzed: sa yat dvitīyam ācāmati ājyabhāgau tena asmin avarunddhe

analyzed: sa yat tṛtīyam ācāmati saṃsthita homān tena asmin avarunddhe

original: (GBr_1,1.39bb) sa yad dviḥ pariśumbhati tat samitsaṃbarhiḥ [ed. saṃmit, cf. Patyal p. 45]
analyzed: sa yat dvis pariśumbhati tat samidh saṃbarhiḥ

original: (GBr_1,1.39cc) sa yat sarvāṇi khāni sarvaṃ deham āpyāyayati yac cānyadātāraṃ mantrakāryaṃ yajñe skandati sarvaṃ tenāsminnavarunddhe
analyzed: sa yat sarvāṇi khāni sarvam deham āpyāyayati yat ca anya dātāram mantra kāryam yajñe skandati sarvam tena asmin avarunddhe

original: (GBr_1,1.39dd) sa yad oṃpūrvān mantrān prayuṅkta ā sarvamedhād ete kratava eta evāsya
analyzed: sa yat oṃ pūrvān mantrān prayuṅkte ā sarvamedhāt ete kratavaḥ ete eva asya

analyzed: sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu deveṣu sarveṣu vedeṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu sarveṣu sattveṣu kāmacāraḥ

original: kāmavimocanaṃ bhavaty ardhe ca na pramīyate ya evaṃ veda
analyzed: kāma vimocanam bhavati ardhe ca na pramīyate yaḥ evam veda

original: (GBr_1,1.39ee) tad apy etad ṛcoktam āpo bhṛgvaṅgiro rūpam āpo bhṛgvaṅgiromayaṃ sarvam āpomayaṃ bhūtaṃ sarvaṃ bhṛgvaṅgiromayam antaraite trayo  #
analyzed: tat api etat ṛcā uktam āpaḥ bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ rūpam āpaḥ bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ mayam sarvam āpaḥ mayam bhūtam sarvam bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ mayam antarā ete trayaḥ

original: (GBr_1,1.39ff) apāṃ puṣpaṃ mūrtir ākāśaṃ pavitram uttamam iti_
analyzed: apām puṣpam mūrtiḥ ākāśam pavitram uttamam iti

iti atharvavede gopathabrāhmaṇa pūrva bhāge prathamaḥ prapāṭhakaḥ
sa sadyas eti pūrvasmāt uttaram samudram

original: (GBr_1,2.1e) eṣa dīkṣita eṣa dīrghaśmaśrur eṣa evācāryasthāne tiṣṭhann ācārya iti stūyate
analyzed: eṣa dīkṣitaḥ eṣa dīrgha śmaśruḥ eṣaḥ eva ācārya sthāne tiṣṭhan ācāryaḥ iti stūyate

original: (GBr_1,2.2a) jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ saptendriyāṇy abhijāyate brahmavarcasaṃ ca yaśaś ca svapnaṃ ca krodhaṃ ca ślāghāṃ ca rūpaṃ ca puṇyam  #
analyzed: jāyamānaḥ ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ sapta indriyāṇi abhijāyate brahmavarcasam ca yaśaḥ ca svapnam ca krodham ca ślāghām ca rūpam ca puṇyam

original: (GBr_1,2.2b) tāni ha vā asyaitāni brahmacaryam upetyopakrāmanti
analyzed: tāni ha vai asya etāni brahmacaryam upetya upakrāmanti

original: (GBr_1,2.2j) sa yan mṛgājināni vaste tena tad brahmavarcasam avarunddhe yad asya mṛgeṣu bhavati
analyzed: sa yat mṛga ajināni vaste tena tat brahmavarcasam avarunddhe yat asya mṛgeṣu bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.2l) sa yad aharahar ācāryāya karma karoti tena tad yaśo 'varunddhe yad asyācārye bhavati
analyzed: sa yat ahar ahar ācāryāya karma karoti tena tat yaśaḥ avarunddhe yat asya ācārye bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.2n) sa yat suṣupsur nidrāṃ ninayati tena taṃ svapnam avarunddhe yo 'syājagare bhavati
analyzed: sa yat suṣupsuḥ nidrām ninayati tena tam svapnam avarunddhe yaḥ asya ājagare bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.2o) taṃ ha snātaṃ svapantam āhuḥ svapitu mainaṃ bobudhatheti
analyzed: tam ha snātam svapantam āhuḥ svapitu mā enam bobudhatha iti

original: (GBr_1,2.2p) sa yat kruddho vācā na kaṃ cana hinasti puruṣātpuruṣāt pāpīyān iva manyamānas tena taṃ krodham avarunddhe yo 'sya varāhe bhavati
analyzed: sa yat kruddhaḥ vācā na kam cana hinasti puruṣāt puruṣāt pāpīyān iva manyamānaḥ tena tam krodham avarunddhe yaḥ asya varāhe bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.2q) tasya ha snātasya krodhāḥ ślāghīyasaṃ viśante_
analyzed: tasya ha snātasya krodhāḥ ślāghīyasam viśante

original: (GBr_1,2.2s) tena tāṃ ślāghām avarunddhe yāsyāpsu bhavati
analyzed: tena tām ślāghām avarunddhe yā asya apsu bhavati
sa ha snātaḥ ślāghīyaḥ anyebhyaḥ ślāghyate
atha etat brahmacāriṇaḥ rūpam yat kumāryāḥ
iti vā iti vā mukham viparidhāpayet

original: (GBr_1,2.2x) tena tad rūpam avarunddhe yad asya kumāryāṃ bhavati
analyzed: tena tat rūpam avarunddhe yat asya kumāryām bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.2y) taṃ ha snātaṃ kumārīm iva nirīkṣante_
analyzed: tam ha snātam kumārīm iva nirīkṣante

original: (GBr_1,2.2z) athaitad brahmacāriṇaḥ puṇyo gandho ya oṣadhivanaspatīnāṃ tāsāṃ puṇyaṃ gandhaṃ pracchidya nopajighret
analyzed: atha etat brahmacāriṇaḥ puṇyaḥ gandhaḥ yaḥ oṣadhi vanaspatīnām tāsām puṇyam gandham pracchidya na upajighret

original: (GBr_1,2.2aa) tena taṃ puṇyaṃ gandham avarunddhe yo 'syauṣadhivanasvapatiṣu bhavati
analyzed: tena tam puṇyam gandham avarunddhe yaḥ asya oṣadhi vana sva patiṣu bhavati
sa ha snātaḥ puṇya gandhiḥ bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.3a) sa vā eṣa upayaṃś caturdhopaity agniṃ pādenācāryaṃ pādena grāmaṃ pādena mṛtyuṃ pādena
analyzed: sa vai eṣaḥ upayan caturdhā upaiti agnim pādena ācāryam pādena grāmam pādena mṛtyum pādena

original: (GBr_1,2.3b) sa yad aharahaḥ samidha āhṛtya sāyaṃprātar agniṃ paricaret tena taṃ pādam avarunddhe yo 'syāgnau bhavati
analyzed: sa yat ahar ahar samidhaḥ āhṛtya sāyaṃprātar agnim paricaret tena tam pādam avarunddhe yaḥ asya agnau bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.3c) sa yad aharahar ācāryāya karma karoti tena taṃ pādam avarunddhe yo 'syācārye bhavati
analyzed: sa yat ahar ahar ācāryāya karma karoti tena tam pādam avarunddhe yaḥ asya ācārye bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.3d) sa yad aharahar grāmaṃ praviśya bhikṣām eva parīpsati na maithunaṃ tena taṃ pādam avarunddhe yo 'sya grāme bhavati
analyzed: sa yat ahar ahar grāmam praviśya bhikṣām eva parīpsati na maithunam tena tam pādam avarunddhe yaḥ asya grāme bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.3e) sa yat kruddho vācā na kaṃ cana hinasti puruṣātpuruṣāt pāpīyān iva manyamānas tena taṃ pādam avarunddhe yo 'sya mṛtyau bhavati
analyzed: sa yat kruddhaḥ vācā na kam cana hinasti puruṣāt puruṣāt pāpīyān iva manyamānaḥ tena tam pādam avarunddhe yaḥ asya mṛtyau bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.4a) pañca ha vā ete brahmacāriṇy agnayo dhīyante
analyzed: pañca ha vai ete brahmacāriṇi agnayaḥ dhīyante

original: (GBr_1,2.4b) dvau pṛthagghastayor mukhe hṛdaya upastha eva pañcamaḥ
analyzed: dvau pṛthak hastayoḥ mukhe hṛdaye upasthe eva pañcamaḥ

original: (GBr_1,2.4c) sa yad dakṣiṇena pāṇinā striyaṃ na spṛśati tenāharaharyājināṃ lokam avarunddhe
analyzed: sa yat dakṣiṇena pāṇinā striyam na spṛśati tena ahar ahar yājinām lokam avarunddhe

original: (GBr_1,2.4h) taiś cet striyaṃ parāharaty anagnir iva śiṣyate
analyzed: taiḥ ced striyam parāharati anagniḥ iva śiṣyate

original: (GBr_1,2.4i) sa yad aharahar ācāryāya kule 'nutiṣṭhate so 'nuṣṭhāya brūyād dharma gupto mā gopāyeti
analyzed: sa yat ahar ahar ācāryāya kule anutiṣṭhate saḥ anuṣṭhāya brūyāt dharma guptaḥ mā gopāya iti

analyzed: tasya ha prajā śvas śvas śreyasī śreyasī iha bhavati

original: (GBr_1,2.4o) yas tāntavaṃ vaste kṣatraṃ vardhate na brahma
analyzed: yaḥ tāntavam vaste kṣatram vardhate na brahma

original: (GBr_1,2.4p) tasmāt tāntavaṃ na vasīta brahma vardhatāṃ mā kṣatram iti
analyzed: tasmāt tāntavam na vasīta brahma vardhatām mā kṣatram iti

original: (GBr_1,2.4r) yad upary āste prāṇam eva tadātmano 'dharaṃ kurute yad vāto vahati_
analyzed: yat upari āste prāṇam eva tadā ātmanaḥ adharam kurute yat vātaḥ vahati

original: (GBr_1,2.4s) adha evāsītādhaḥ śayītādhas tiṣṭhed adho vrajet_
analyzed: adhas eva āsīta adhas śayīta adhas tiṣṭhet adhas vrajet

original: (GBr_1,2.4t) evaṃ ha sma vai tat pūrve brāhmaṇā brahmacaryaṃ caranti
analyzed: evam ha sma vai tat pūrve brāhmaṇāḥ brahmacaryam caranti

original: (GBr_1,2.4u) taṃ ha sma tatputraṃ bhrātaraṃ vopatāpinam āhur upanayetainam iti_
analyzed: tam ha sma tad putram bhrātaram vā upatāpinam āhuḥ upanayeta enam iti
ā samidh hārāt svar eṣyantaḥ annam adyāt

original: (GBr_1,2.4w) athāha jaghanam āhuḥ snāpayetainam itiy ā samiddhārāt_
analyzed: atha āha jaghanam āhuḥ snāpayeta enam iti ā samidh hārāt

original: (GBr_1,2.4y) taṃ cec chayānam ācāryo 'bhivadet sa pratisaṃhāya pratiśṛṇuyāt
analyzed: tam ced śayānam ācāryaḥ abhivadet sa pratisaṃhāya pratiśṛṇuyāt

original: (GBr_1,2.4z) taṃ cec chayānam utthāya taṃ ced utthitam abhiprakramya taṃ ced abhiprakrāntam abhipalāyamānam

original: (GBr_1,2.11k) te brūmaḥ prāṇāpānāv evādhvaryuḥ prāṇāpānau brahma prāṇāpānau deva iti
analyzed: te brūmaḥ prāṇa apānau eva adhvaryuḥ prāṇa apānau brahma prāṇa apānau devaḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,2.11n) atho cakṣur evodgātā cakṣur brahma cakṣur deva iti
analyzed: atha u cakṣuḥ eva udgātā cakṣuḥ brahma cakṣuḥ devaḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,2.11p) manasā hi tiryak ca diśa ūrdhvaṃ yac ca kiṃ ca manasaiva karoti tad brahma
analyzed: manasā hi tiryak ca diśaḥ ūrdhvam yat ca kim ca manasā eva karoti tat brahma

original: (GBr_1,2.11q) te brūmo mana eva brahmā mano brahma mano deva iti // 11 //
analyzed: te brūmaḥ manaḥ eva brahmā manaḥ brahma manaḥ devaḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,2.12a) tad yathā ha vā idaṃ yajamānaś ca yājayitāraś ca divaṃ brūyuḥ pṛthivīti pṛthivīṃ vā dyaur iti brūyus tad anyo nānujānāty etām  #
analyzed: tat yathā ha vai idam yajamānaḥ ca yājayitāraḥ ca divam brūyuḥ pṛthivī iti pṛthivīm vā dyauḥ iti brūyuḥ tat anyaḥ na anujānāti etām  /
evam na anujānāti yat etat brūyāt

original: (GBr_1,2.12c) hotety eva hotāraṃ brūyād vāg iti vācaṃ brahmeti brahma deva iti devam
analyzed: hotā iti eva hotāram brūyāt vāc iti vācam brahma iti brahma devaḥ iti devam

original: adhvaryur ity evādhvaryuṃ brūyāt prāṇāpānāv iti prāṇāpānau brahmeti brahma deva iti
analyzed: adhvaryuḥ iti eva adhvaryum brūyāt prāṇa apānau iti prāṇa apānau brahma iti brahma devaḥ iti

original: devam udgātety evodgātāraṃ brūyāc cakṣur iti cakṣur brahmeti brahma deva iti devaṃ
analyzed: devam udgātā iti eva udgātāram brūyāt cakṣuḥ iti cakṣuḥ brahma iti brahma devaḥ iti devam

original: brahmety eva brahmāṇaṃ brūyān mana iti mano brahmeti brahma deva iti devam // 12 //
analyzed: brahma iti eva brahmāṇam brūyāt manaḥ iti manaḥ brahma iti brahma devaḥ iti devam

original: (GBr_1,2.13a) nānāpravacanāni ha vā etāni bhūtāni bhavanti
analyzed: nānā pravacanāni ha vai etāni bhūtāni bhavanti

original: (GBr_1,2.13a) ye caivāsomapaṃ yājayanti ye ca surāpaṃ ye ca brāhmaṇaṃ vicchinnaṃ somayājinaṃ taṃ prātaḥ samitpāṇaya upodeyur upāyāmo bhavantam
analyzed: ye ca eva asomapam yājayanti ye ca surāpam ye ca brāhmaṇam vicchinnam soma yājinam tam prātar samidh pāṇayaḥ upodeyuḥ upāyāmaḥ bhavantam

original: (GBr_1,2.13a) yān eva no bhavāṃs tān hyaḥ praśnān apṛcchat tān eva no bhavān vyācakṣīteti
analyzed: yān eva naḥ bhavān tān hyas praśnān apṛcchat tān eva naḥ bhavān vyācakṣīta iti

original: (GBr_1,2.13a) tad yena ha vā idaṃ vidyamānaṃ cāvidyamānaṃ cābhinidadhāti tad brahma
analyzed: tat yena ha vai idam vidyamānam ca a vidyamānam ca abhinidadhāti tat brahma

original: (GBr_1,2.13a) tad yo veda sa brāhmaṇo 'dhīyāno 'dhītyācakṣata iti brāhmaṇam // 13 //
analyzed: tat yaḥ veda sa brāhmaṇaḥ adhīyānaḥ adhītya ācakṣate iti brāhmaṇam

original: (GBr_1,2.14f) tad vā etad ātmā devayajanaṃ yad upavyāyacchamāno vānupavyāyacchamāno vā śarīram adhivasati_
analyzed: tat vai etat ātmā devayajanam yat upavyāyacchamānaḥ vā an upavyāyacchamānaḥ vā śarīram adhivasati
śraddhā tu eva enam na atīyāt

original: (GBr_1,2.14p) yatra kva cid brāhmaṇo vidyāvān mantreṇa karoti tad devayajanam
analyzed: yatra kva cit brāhmaṇaḥ vidyāvān mantreṇa karoti tat devayajanam

original: (GBr_1,2.14r) yatrāpas tiṣṭhanti yatra syandanti pra tad vahanty udvahanti tad devayajanam_
analyzed: yatra āpaḥ tiṣṭhanti yatra syandanti pra tat vahanti udvahanti tat devayajanam

original: (GBr_1,2.14s) yat samaṃ samūlam avidagdhaṃ pratiṣṭhitaṃ prāgudakpravaṇaṃ samaṃ samāstīrṇam iva bhavati yasya śvabhra ūrmo vṛkṣaḥ parvato nadī  #
analyzed: yat samam sa mūlam a vidagdham pratiṣṭhitam prāc udak pravaṇam samam samāstīrṇam iva bhavati yasya śvabhraḥ ūrmaḥ vṛkṣaḥ parvataḥ nadī
na uttaratas agneḥ paryupasīderan iti brāhmaṇam  /
aditiḥ vai prajā kāmā odanam apacat

original: (GBr_1,2.15e) ya eṣa odanaḥ pacyata ārambhaṇam evaitat kriyata ākramaṇam eva
analyzed: yaḥ eṣaḥ odanaḥ pacyate ārambhaṇam eva etat kriyate ākramaṇam eva

original: (GBr_1,2.15h) agner vai yā yajñiyā tanūr aśvatthe tayā samagacchata_
analyzed: agneḥ vai yā yajñiyā tanūḥ aśvatthe tayā samagacchata
eṣā asya ghṛtyā tanūḥ yat ghṛtam

original: (GBr_1,2.15j) yad ghṛtena samidho 'nakti tābhyām evainaṃ tat tanūbhyāṃ samardhayati
analyzed: yat ghṛtena samidhaḥ anakti tābhyām eva enam tat tanūbhyām samardhayati

original: (GBr_1,2.15k) yan nirmārgasyādadhāty avagūrtyā vai vīryaṃ kriyate
analyzed: yat nirmārgasya ādadhāti avagūrtyāḥ vai vīryam kriyate

original: (GBr_1,2.15p) yat saṃvatsara ṛcāgnau samidham ādadhāti prajananād evainaṃ tat prajanayitā prajanayati_
analyzed: yat saṃvatsare ṛcā agnau samidham ādadhāti prajananāt eva enam tat prajanayitā prajanayati

original: (GBr_1,2.15r) na hi tad veda yam ṛtum abhijāyate
analyzed: na hi tat veda yam ṛtum abhijāyate

original: (GBr_1,2.15t) ya eṣa odanaḥ pacyate yonir evaiṣā kriyate
analyzed: yaḥ eṣaḥ odanaḥ pacyate yoniḥ eva eṣā kriyate

original: (GBr_1,2.15u) yat samidha ādhīyante retas tad dhīyate
analyzed: yat samidhaḥ ādhīyante retaḥ tat dhīyate

original: (GBr_1,2.15w) yaḥ saṃvatsare paryete 'gnim ādhatte prajātam evainam ādhatte
analyzed: yaḥ saṃvatsare paryete agnim ādhatte prajātam eva enam ādhatte

original: (GBr_1,2.15z) atho tisṛṣv atho dvayor atho pūrvedyur ādheyās ta evāgnim ādadhānena_
analyzed: atha u tisṛṣu atha u dvayoḥ atha u pūrvedyus ādheyāḥ te eva agnim ādadhānena

original: (GBr_1,2.15aa) ādityā vā ita uttamā amuṃ lokam āyan_
analyzed: ādityāḥ vai itas uttamāḥ amum lokam āyan

original: (GBr_1,2.15ee) yad ucchiṣṭena samidho 'nakti tebhya eva prāvocat tebhya eva procya svargaṃ lokaṃ yāti // 15 //
analyzed: yat ucchiṣṭena samidhaḥ anakti tebhyaḥ eva prāvocat tebhyaḥ eva procya svargam lokam yāti  /

original: (GBr_1,2.16a) prajāpatir atharvā devaḥ sa tapas taptvaitaṃ cātuḥprāśyaṃ brahmaudanaṃ niramimīta caturlokaṃ caturdevaṃ caturvedaṃ caturhautram
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ atharvā devaḥ sa tapaḥ taptvā etam cātuḥprāśyam brahmaudanam niramimīta catur lokam catur devam catur vedam catur hautram

original: (GBr_1,2.16b) catvāro vā ime lokāḥ pṛthivy antarikṣaṃ dyaur āpa iti
analyzed: catvāraḥ vai ime lokāḥ pṛthivī antarikṣam dyauḥ āpaḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,2.16c) catvāro vā ime devā agnir vāyur ādityaś candramāḥ_
analyzed: catvāraḥ vai ime devāḥ agniḥ vāyuḥ ādityaḥ candramāḥ

original: (GBr_1,2.16d) catvāro vā ime vedā ṛgvedo yajurvedaḥ sāmavedo brahmaveda iti
analyzed: catvāraḥ vai ime vedāḥ ṛgvedaḥ yajurvedaḥ sāmavedaḥ brahmavedaḥ iti

analyzed: catasraḥ vai imāḥ hotrāḥ hautram ādhvaryavam audgātram brahmatvam iti

original: catvāri śṛṅgā trayo asya pādā dve śīrṣe sapta hastāso asya /
analyzed: catvāri śṛṅgā trayaḥ asya pādāḥ dve śīrṣe sapta hastāsaḥ asya

original: tridhā baddho vṛṣabho roravīti maho devo martyāṃ āviveśa [PS 8.13.3])_iti
analyzed: tridhā baddhaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti mahaḥ devaḥ martyām āviveśa

original: (GBr_1,2.16g) catvāri śṛṅgeti vedā vā eta uktās
analyzed: catvāri śṛṅgā iti vedāḥ vai ete uktāḥ

analyzed: trayaḥ asya pādāḥ iti savanāni eva
dve śīrṣe iti brahmaudana pravargyau eva
sapta hastāsaḥ asya iti chandāṃsi eva

original: (GBr_1,2.16k) tridhā baddha iti mantraḥ kalpo brāhmaṇam_
analyzed: tridhā baddhaḥ iti mantraḥ kalpaḥ brāhmaṇam

original: (GBr_1,2.16l) vṛṣabho roravīty eṣa ha vai vṛṣabha eṣa tad roravīti yad yajñeṣu śastrāṇi śaṃsaty ṛgbhir yajurbhiḥ sāmabhir brahmabhir iti
analyzed: vṛṣabhaḥ roravīti eṣa ha vai vṛṣabhaḥ eṣa tat roravīti yat yajñeṣu śastrāṇi śaṃsati ṛgbhiḥ yajurbhiḥ sāmabhiḥ brahmabhiḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,2.16m) maho devo martyāṃ āviveśety eṣa ha vai mahān devo yad yajñaḥ_
analyzed: mahaḥ devaḥ martyām āviveśa iti eṣa ha vai mahān devaḥ yat yajñaḥ

analyzed: yaḥ vidyāt sapta pravataḥ iti prāṇān āha

original: (GBr_1,2.16p) sapta vidyāt parāvata ity apānān āha
analyzed: sapta vidyāt parāvataḥ iti apānān āha

original: (GBr_1,2.16r) yo ha vā etam amantravantaṃ brahmaudanam upeyād apaśirasā ha vā asya yajñam upeto bhavati
analyzed: yaḥ ha vai etam a mantravantam brahmaudanam upeyāt apaśirasā ha vai asya yajñam upetaḥ bhavati

original: srutād yam atrir divam unnināya [ŚS 13.2.4c, PS 18.20.8c])
(GBr_1,2.17f) (divi tvātrir adhārayat sūryā māsāya kartave [ŚS 13.2.12ab, PS 18.21.6ab])_iti
analyzed: divi tvā atriḥ adhārayat sūrya māsāya kartave

original: (GBr_1,2.17h) sa hovāca dakṣiṇīyā me prajā syād iti
analyzed: sa ha uvāca dakṣiṇīyā me prajā syāt iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18b) tān vāg abhyuvācāśvo vai sambhārāṇām iti
analyzed: tān vāc abhyuvāca aśvaḥ vai sambhārāṇām iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18c) taṃ ghorāt krūrāt salilāt sarasa udāninyus
analyzed: tam ghorāt krūrāt salilāt sarasaḥ udāninyuḥ
tān vāc abhyuvāca aśvaḥ śamyeta iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18f) tam ṛgveda etyovācāham aśvaṃ śameyam iti
analyzed: tam ṛgvedaḥ etya uvāca aham aśvam śameyam iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18i) sa hovācāśānto nv ayam aśva iti
analyzed: sa ha uvāca aśāntaḥ nu ayam aśvaḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18j) taṃ yajurveda etyovācāham aśvaṃ śameyam iti
analyzed: tam yajurvedaḥ etya uvāca aham aśvam śameyam iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18m) sa hovācāśānto nv ayam aśva iti
analyzed: sa ha uvāca aśāntaḥ nu ayam aśvaḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18n) taṃ sāmaveda etyovācāham aśvaṃ śameyam iti
analyzed: tam sāmavedaḥ etya uvāca aham aśvam śameyam iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18p) rathantaraṃ nāma me sāmāghoraṃ cākrūraṃ ca
analyzed: rathantaram nāma me sāma aghoram ca akrūram ca

original: (GBr_1,2.18r) tasmā apy abhisṛptāya tad eva mahad bhayaṃ sasṛje
analyzed: tasmai api abhisṛptāya tat eva mahat bhayam sasṛje

original: (GBr_1,2.18t) sa hovācāśānto nv ayam aśva iti
analyzed: sa ha uvāca aśāntaḥ nu ayam aśvaḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18v) te śaṃyumātharvaṇam āsīnaṃ prāpyocur namas te astu bhagavann aśvaḥ śamyeteti
analyzed: te śaṃyum ātharvaṇam āsīnam prāpya ūcuḥ namaḥ te astu bhagavan aśvaḥ śamyeta iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18x) sa khalu kabandhasyātharvaṇasya putram āmantrayām āsa vicārinn iti
analyzed: sa khalu kabandhasya ātharvaṇasya putram āmantrayām āsa vicārin iti
bhago iti ha asmai pratiśrutam pratiśruśrāva

original: (GBr_1,2.18bb) sa khalu śāntyudakaṃ cakārātharvaṇībhiś cāṅgirasībhiś ca cātanair mātṛnāmabhir vāstoṣpatyair iti śamayati
analyzed: sa khalu śāntyudakam cakāra ātharvaṇībhiḥ ca āṅgirasībhiḥ ca cātanaiḥ mātṛnāmabhiḥ vāstoṣpatyaiḥ iti śamayati

original: (GBr_1,2.18cc) tasya ha snātasyāśvasyābhyukṣitasya sarvebhyo romasamarebhyo 'ṅgārā āśīryanta
analyzed: tasya ha snātasya aśvasya abhyukṣitasya sarvebhyaḥ roma samarebhyaḥ aṅgārāḥ āśīryanta

analyzed: namaḥ śaṃyum ātharvaṇāya yaḥ mā yajñiyam acīkḷpat iti

original: (GBr_1,2.18ff) bhaviṣyanti ha vā ato 'nye brāhmaṇā laghusambhāratamās
analyzed: bhaviṣyanti ha vai atas anye brāhmaṇāḥ laghu sambhāratamāḥ

original: (GBr_1,2.18gg) ta ādityasya pada ādhāsyanty anaḍuho vatsasyājasya śravaṇasya brahmacāriṇo vā_
analyzed: te ādityasya pade ādhāsyanti anaḍuhaḥ vatsasya ajasya śravaṇasya brahmacāriṇaḥ vā

original: (GBr_1,2.18hh) etad vā ādityasya padaṃ yad bhūmis
analyzed: etat vai ādityasya padam yat bhūmiḥ
tasya eva pade āhitam bhaviṣyati iti
saḥ agnau praṇīyamāṇe aśve anvārabdham brahmā yajamānam vācayati
yat akrandaḥ prathamam jāyamānaḥ ṛv pañca
tam brāhmaṇāḥ upavahanti tam brahma upākuruta

original: (GBr_1,2.18ll) eṣa ha vai vidvānt sarvavid brahmā yad bhṛṅgirovid iti brāhmaṇam // 18 //
analyzed: eṣa ha vai vidvān sarva vid brahmā yat bhṛṅgiraḥ vid iti brāhmaṇam

original: (GBr_1,2.19a) devāś ca ha vā asurāś cāspardhanta
analyzed: devāḥ ca ha vai asurāḥ ca aspardhanta

original: (GBr_1,2.19b) te devā indram abruvann imaṃ nas tāvad yajñaṃ gopāya yāvad asuraiḥ saṃyatāmahā iti
analyzed: te devāḥ indram abruvan imam naḥ tāvat yajñam gopāya yāvat asuraiḥ saṃyatāmahai iti

original: (GBr_1,2.19c) sa vai nas tena rūpeṇa gopāya yena no rūpeṇa bhūyiṣṭhaṃ chādayasi yena śakṣyasi goptum iti
analyzed: sa vai naḥ tena rūpeṇa gopāya yena naḥ rūpeṇa bhūyiṣṭham chādayasi yena śakṣyasi goptum iti
saḥ ṛgvedaḥ bhūtvā purastāt parītya upātiṣṭhat

original: (GBr_1,2.19e) taṃ devā abruvann anyat tad rūpaṃ kuruṣva naitena no rūpeṇa bhūyiṣṭhaṃ chādayasi naitena śakṣyasi goptum iti
analyzed: tam devāḥ abruvan anyat tat rūpam kuruṣva na etena naḥ rūpeṇa bhūyiṣṭham chādayasi na etena śakṣyasi goptum iti

original: (GBr_1,2.19g) taṃ devā abruvann anyat tad rūpaṃ kuruṣva naitena no rūpeṇa bhūyiṣṭhaṃ chādayasi naitena śakṣyasi goptum iti
analyzed: tam devāḥ abruvan anyat tat rūpam kuruṣva na etena naḥ rūpeṇa bhūyiṣṭham chādayasi na etena śakṣyasi goptum iti
sa samāvedaḥ bhūtvā uttaratas parītya upātiṣṭhat

original: (GBr_1,2.19i) taṃ devā abruvann anyad eva tad rūpaṃ kuruṣva naitena no rūpeṇa bhūyiṣṭhaṃ chādayasi naitena śakṣyasi goptum iti
analyzed: tam devāḥ abruvan anyat eva tat rūpam kuruṣva na etena naḥ rūpeṇa bhūyiṣṭham chādayasi na etena śakṣyasi goptum iti

original: (GBr_1,2.19j) sa indra uṣṇīṣī brahmavedo bhūtvā dakṣiṇataḥ parītyopātiṣṭhat
analyzed: saḥ indraḥ uṣṇīṣī brahmavedaḥ bhūtvā dakṣiṇatas parītya upātiṣṭhat

original: (GBr_1,2.19k) taṃ devā abruvann etat tad rūpaṃ kuruṣvaitena no rūpeṇa bhūyiṣṭhaṃ chādayasy etena śakṣyasi goptum iti
analyzed: tam devāḥ abruvan etat tat rūpam kuruṣva etena naḥ rūpeṇa bhūyiṣṭham chādayasi etena śakṣyasi goptum iti

original: (GBr_1,2.19l) tad yad indra uṣṇīṣī brahmavedo bhūtvā dakṣiṇataḥ parītyopātiṣṭhat tad brahmābhavat
analyzed: tat yat indraḥ uṣṇīṣī brahmavedaḥ bhūtvā dakṣiṇatas parītya upātiṣṭhat tat brahma abhavat

original: (GBr_1,2.19n) tad vā etad atharvaṇo rūpaṃ yad uṣṇīṣī brahmā
analyzed: tat vai etat atharvaṇaḥ rūpam yat uṣṇīṣī brahmā

original: (GBr_1,2.19p) taṃ yad dakṣiṇato viśve devā upāsīdaṃs tat sadasyo 'bhavat

analyzed: evam eva eṣā vyāhṛtiḥ sarvān vedān abhivahati om iti ha ṛcām om iti yajuṣām om iti sāmnām om iti sarvasya āha abhivādaḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.1e) taṃ ha smaitad uttaraṃ yajñe vidvāṃsaḥ kurvanti
analyzed: tam ha sma etat uttaram yajñe vidvāṃsaḥ kurvanti

original: (GBr_1,3.1g) ete vai devā brahmāṇo yad bhṛgvaṅgirasas
analyzed: ete vai devāḥ brahmāṇaḥ yat bhṛgu aṅgirasaḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.1h) tān evaitad gṛṇānās tān vṛṇānā hvayanto manyante
analyzed: tān eva etat gṛṇānāḥ tān vṛṇānāḥ hvayantaḥ manyante
na anyaḥ a bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ vidaḥ vṛtaḥ yajñam āgacchet

original: (GBr_1,3.1j) yajñasya tejasā teja āpnoty ūrjayorjāṃ yaśasā yaśaḥ_
analyzed: yajñasya tejasā tejaḥ āpnoti ūrjayā ūrjām yaśasā yaśaḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.1k) nānyo 'bhṛgvaṅgirovido vṛto yajñam āgacchen ned yajñaṃ parimuṣṇīyād iti
analyzed: na anyaḥ a bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ vidaḥ vṛtaḥ yajñam āgacchet na id yajñam parimuṣṇīyāt iti

original: (GBr_1,3.1l) tad yathā pūrvaṃ vatso 'dhītya gāṃ dhayed evaṃ brahmā bhṛgvaṅgirovid vṛto yajñam āgacchen ned yajñaṃ parimuṣṇīyād iti
analyzed: tat yathā pūrvam vatsaḥ adhītya gām dhayet evam brahmā bhṛgu aṅgiraḥ vid vṛtaḥ yajñam āgacchet na id yajñam parimuṣṇīyāt iti

original: (GBr_1,3.1m) tad yathā gaur vāśvo vāśvataro vaikapād dvipāt tripād iti syāt kim abhivahet kim abhyaśnuyād iti
analyzed: tat yathā gauḥ vā aśvaḥ vā aśvataraḥ vā ekapād dvipād tripād iti syāt kim abhivahet kim abhyaśnuyāt iti

original: (GBr_1,3.1n) tasmād ṛgvidam eva hotāraṃ vṛṇīṣva yajurvidam adhvaryuṃ sāmavidam udgātāram atharvāṅgirovidaṃ brahmāṇam_
analyzed: tasmāt ṛk vidam eva hotāram vṛṇīṣva yajuḥ vidam adhvaryum sāma vidam udgātāram atharva aṅgiraḥ vidam brahmāṇam

original: (GBr_1,3.1o) tathā hāsya yajñaś caturṣu lokeṣu caturṣu deveṣu vedeṣu catasṛṣu hotrāsu catuṣpād yajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati
analyzed: tathā ha asya yajñaḥ caturṣu lokeṣu caturṣu deveṣu vedeṣu catasṛṣu hotrāsu catuṣpād yajñaḥ pratitiṣṭhati

original: (GBr_1,3.1p) pratitiṣṭhati prajayā paśubhir ya evaṃ veda yaś caivam ṛtvijām ārtvijyaṃ veda yaś ca yajñe yajanīyaṃ vedeti brāhmaṇam // 1 //
analyzed: pratitiṣṭhati prajayā paśubhiḥ yaḥ evam veda yaḥ ca evam ṛtvijām ārtvijyam veda yaḥ ca yajñe yajanīyam veda iti brāhmaṇam  /

original: (GBr_1,3.2b) sa ṛcaiva hautram akarod yajuṣādhvaryavaṃ sāmnaudgātram atharvāṅgirobhir brahmatvam_
analyzed: saḥ ṛcā eva hautram akarot yajuṣā ādhvaryavam sāmnā audgātram atharva aṅgirobhiḥ brahmatvam

original: (GBr_1,3.2c) taṃ vā etaṃ mahāvādyaṃ kurute yad ṛcaiva hautram akarod yajuṣādhvaryavaṃ sāmnaudgātram atharvāṅgirobhir brahmatvam_
analyzed: tam vai etam mahāvādyam kurute yat ṛcā eva hautram akarot yajuṣā ādhvaryavam sāmnā audgātram atharva aṅgirobhiḥ brahmatvam

original: (GBr_1,3.2d) sa vā eṣa tribhir vedair yajñasyānyataraḥ pakṣaḥ saṃskriyate
analyzed: sa vai eṣa tribhiḥ vedaiḥ yajñasya anyataraḥ pakṣaḥ saṃskriyate

original: (GBr_1,3.2f) ayam u vai yaḥ pavate sa yajñas
analyzed: ayam u vai yaḥ pavate sa yajñaḥ

analyzed: tasya manaḥ ca vāc ca vartanī

original: (GBr_1,3.2h) manasā caiva hi vācā ca yajño vartate_
analyzed: manasā ca eva hi vācā ca yajñaḥ vartate

original: (GBr_1,3.2i) ada eva mana iyam eva vāk
analyzed: adaḥ eva manaḥ iyam eva vāc

original: (GBr_1,3.2j) sa yad vadan nāsti vidyād ardhaṃ me 'sya yajñasyāntaragād iti
analyzed: sa yat vadan na asti vidyāt ardham me asya yajñasya antaragāt iti

original: (GBr_1,3.2k) tad yathaikapāt puruṣo yann ekacakro vā ratho vartamāno bhreṣaṃ nyety evam evāsya yajño bhreṣaṃ nyeti
analyzed: tat yathā eka pād puruṣaḥ yan eka cakraḥ vā rathaḥ vartamānaḥ bhreṣam nyeti evam eva asya yajñaḥ bhreṣam nyeti

original: (GBr_1,3.2l) yajñasya bhreṣam anu yajamāno bhreṣaṃ nyeti
analyzed: yajñasya bhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ bhreṣam nyeti

original: (GBr_1,3.2m) yajamānasya bhreṣam anv ṛtvijo bhreṣaṃ niyanti_
analyzed: yajamānasya bhreṣam anu ṛtvijaḥ bhreṣam niyanti

original: (GBr_1,3.2n) ṛtvijāṃ bhreṣam anu dakṣiṇā bhreṣaṃ niyanti
analyzed: ṛtvijām bhreṣam anu dakṣiṇāḥ bhreṣam niyanti

original: (GBr_1,3.2o) dakṣiṇānāṃ bhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ putrapaśubhir bhreṣaṃ nyeti
analyzed: dakṣiṇānām bhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ putra paśubhiḥ bhreṣam nyeti

analyzed: putra paśūnām bhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ svargeṇa lokena bhreṣam nyeti

original: (GBr_1,3.2q) svargasya lokasya bhreṣam anu tasyārdhasya yogakṣemo bhreṣaṃ nyeti yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // 2 //
analyzed: svargasya lokasya bhreṣam anu tasya ardhasya yogakṣemaḥ bhreṣam nyeti yasmin ardhe yajante iti brāhmaṇam  /

original: (GBr_1,3.3a) tad u ha smāha śvetaketur āruṇeyo brahmāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāṣamāṇam ardhaṃ me 'sya yajñasyāntaragād iti
analyzed: tat u ha sma āha śvetaketuḥ āruṇeyaḥ brahmāṇam dṛṣṭvā bhāṣamāṇam ardham me asya yajñasya antaragāt iti

original: (GBr_1,3.3b) tasmād brahmā stute bahiḥpavamāne vācoyamyam upāṃśv antaryāmābhyām
analyzed: tasmāt brahmā stute bahiḥpavamāne vācoyamyam upāṃśu antaryāmābhyām

original: (GBr_1,3.3d) atha yāni stotrāṇi saśastrāṇy ā vaṣaṭkārāt teṣu
analyzed: atha yāni stotrāṇi sa śastrāṇi ā vaṣaṭkārāt teṣu

original: (GBr_1,3.3e) sa yad ṛkto bhreṣaṃ nyṛcched oṃ bhūr janad iti gārhapatye juhuyāt_

analyzed: yadi an ājñātāt brahmataḥ vā om bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar janat om iti āhavanīye eva juhuyāt
tat vākovākyasya ṛcām yajuṣām sāmnām atharva aṅgirasām

analyzed: atha api vedānām rasana yajñasya viriṣṭam saṃdhīyate

original: (GBr_1,3.3l) tad yathobhayapāt puruṣo yann ubhayacakro vā ratho vartamāno 'bhreṣaṃ nyeti evam evāsya yajño 'bhreṣaṃ nyeti
analyzed: tat yathā ubhaya pād puruṣaḥ yan ubhaya cakraḥ vā rathaḥ vartamānaḥ abhreṣam nyeti evam eva asya yajñaḥ abhreṣam nyeti
yajñasya abhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ abhreṣam nyeti
yajamānasya a bhreṣam anu ṛtvijaḥ a bhreṣam niyanti

analyzed: ṛtvijām a bhreṣam anu dakṣiṇāḥ a bhreṣam niyanti

analyzed: dakṣiṇānām a bhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ putra paśubhiḥ a bhreṣam nyeti

original: (GBr_1,3.3q) putrapaśūnām abhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ svargeṇa lokenābhreṣaṃ nyeti
analyzed: putra paśūnām abhreṣam anu yajamānaḥ svargeṇa lokena abhreṣam nyeti

original: (GBr_1,3.3r) svargasya lokasyābhreṣam anu tasyārdhasya yogakṣemo 'bhreṣaṃ nyeti yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // 3 //
analyzed: svargasya lokasya abhreṣam anu tasya ardhasya yogakṣemaḥ abhreṣam nyeti yasmin ardhe yajante iti brāhmaṇam  /

original: (GBr_1,3.4a) tad yad audumbaryāṃ ma āsiṣṭa hiṅṅ akārṣīn me prāstāvīn ma udagāsīn me subrahmaṇyām āhvāsīd ity udgātre dakṣiṇā nīyante
analyzed: tat yat audumbaryām me āsiṣṭa hiṅ akārṣīt me prāstāvīt me udagāsīt me subrahmaṇyām āhvāsīt iti udgātre dakṣiṇāḥ nīyante

original: (GBr_1,3.4b) grahān me 'grahīt prācārīn me 'śuśruvan me samanasas kārṣīd ayākṣīn me 'vaṣaṭkārṣīn ma ity adhvaryave
analyzed: grahān me agrahīt prācārīt me aśuśruvat me samanasaḥ kārṣīt ayākṣīt me avaṣaṭkārṣīt me iti adhvaryave

original: (GBr_1,3.4c) hotṛṣadana āsiṣṭāyākṣīn me 'śāṃsīn me 'vaṣaṭkārṣīn ma iti hotre
analyzed: hotṛṣadane āsiṣṭa ayākṣīt me aśāṃsīt me avaṣaṭkārṣīt me iti hotre

original: (GBr_1,3.4d) devayajanaṃ me cīkḷpad brahmāsādaṃ me 'sīsṛpad brahmajapān me 'japīt purastāddhomasaṃsthitahomān me 'hauṣīd ayākṣīn me 'śāṃsīn  #
analyzed: devayajanam me cīkḷpat brahma āsādam me asīsṛpat brahmajapān me ajapīt purastāddhoma saṃsthita homān me ahauṣīt ayākṣīt me aśāṃsīt  /

original: (GBr_1,3.4f) etad vai bhūyiṣṭhaṃ brahma yad bhṛgvaṅgirasaḥ_
analyzed: etat vai bhūyiṣṭham brahma yat bhṛgu aṅgirasaḥ

analyzed: ye aṅgirasaḥ sa rasaḥ ye atharvāṇaḥ ye atharvāṇaḥ tat bheṣajam

original: (GBr_1,3.4h) yad bheṣajaṃ tad amṛtaṃ yad amṛtaṃ tad brahma
analyzed: yat bheṣajam tat amṛtam yat amṛtam tat brahma

original: (GBr_1,3.4i) sa vā eṣa pūrveṣām ṛtvijām ardhabhāgasyārdham itareṣām ardhaṃ brahmaṇa iti brāhmaṇam // 4 //
analyzed: sa vai eṣa pūrveṣām ṛtvijām ardha bhāgasya ardham itareṣām ardham brahmaṇaḥ iti brāhmaṇam  /

original: (GBr_1,3.5a) devāś ca ha vā asurāś ca saṃgrāmaṃ samayatanta
analyzed: devāḥ ca ha vai asurāḥ ca saṃgrāmam samayatanta

original: (GBr_1,3.5f) pra'ugaṃ potur vaiśvadevaṃ ha vai hotur babhūva
analyzed: pra ogam potuḥ vaiśvadevam ha vai hotuḥ babhūva

original: (GBr_1,3.5j) tasmād etad abhyastataram iva śasyate yad āgnimārutam_
analyzed: tasmāt etat abhyastataram iva śasyate yat āgnimārutam

original: (GBr_1,3.5k) tasmād ete saṃśaṃsukā iva bhavanti yad dhotā potā neṣṭā_
analyzed: tasmāt ete saṃśaṃsukāḥ iva bhavanti yat hotā potā neṣṭā

original: (GBr_1,3.5n) tāsām ardhaṃ pratilulopa prathamārhaṇaṃ ca prathamapadaṃ caitad dakṣiṇāṃ caitat pariśiṣeded iti brāhmaṇam // 5 //
analyzed: tāsām ardham pratilulopa prathama arhaṇam ca prathama padam ca etat dakṣiṇām ca etat pariśiṣedet iti brāhmaṇam  /

original: (GBr_1,3.6a) uddālako ha vā āruṇir udīcyān vṛto dhāvayāṃ cakāra
analyzed: uddālakaḥ ha vai āruṇiḥ udīcyān vṛtaḥ dhāvayām cakāra

original: (GBr_1,3.6b) tasya ha niṣka upāhito babhūvopavādād bibhyato yo mā brāhmaṇo 'nūcāna upavadiṣyati tasmā etaṃ pradāsyamīti
analyzed: tasya ha niṣkaḥ upāhitaḥ babhūva upavādāt bibhyataḥ yaḥ mā brāhmaṇaḥ anūcānaḥ upavadiṣyati tasmai etam pradāsyami iti

original: (GBr_1,3.6c) tad dhodīcyān brāhmaṇān bhayaṃ vivedoddālako ha vā ayam āyāti kaurupañcolo brahmā brahmaputraḥ
analyzed: tat ha udīcyān brāhmaṇān bhayam viveda uddālakaḥ ha vai ayam āyāti kaurupañcolaḥ brahmā brahma putraḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.6f) taṃ yata eva prapannaṃ dadhre tata evam anupratipedire te ha svaidāyanaṃ śaunakam ūcuḥ svaidāyana tvaṃ vai no brahmiṣṭho 'sīti
analyzed: tam yatas eva prapannam dadhre tatas evam anupratipedire te ha svaidāyanam śaunakam ūcuḥ svaidāyana tvam vai naḥ brahmiṣṭhaḥ asi iti

original: (GBr_1,3.6h) taṃ yata eva prapannaṃ dadhre tata evam anupratipedire
analyzed: tam yatas eva prapannam dadhre tatas evam anupratipedire

original: (GBr_1,3.6i) taṃ ha svaidāyanā ity āmantrayām āsa
analyzed: tam ha svaidāyanāḥ iti āmantrayām āsa

original: (GBr_1,3.6j) sa bho gautamasya putreti hāsmā asūyā pratiśrutaṃ pratiśuśrāva
analyzed: sa bho gautamasya putra iti ha asmai asūyā pratiśrutam pratiśuśrāva

original: (GBr_1,3.6k) sa vai gautamasya putra ūrdhvaṃ vṛto dhāvet // 6 //
analyzed: sa vai gautamasya putraḥ ūrdhvam vṛtaḥ dhāvet  /

original: (GBr_1,3.7a) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād imāḥ prajāḥ śirastaḥ prathamaṃ lomaśā jāyante kasmād āsām aparam iva śmaśrūṇy upakakṣāṇy  #
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt imāḥ prajāḥ śirastaḥ prathamam lomaśāḥ jāyante kasmāt āsām aparam iva śmaśrūṇi upakakṣāṇi

original: (GBr_1,3.7b) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād imāḥ prājāḥ śirastaḥ prathamaṃ palitā bhavanti kasmād antataḥ sarvā eva palitā bhavanti
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt imāḥ prājāḥ śirastaḥ prathamam palitāḥ bhavanti kasmāt antatas sarvāḥ eva palitāḥ bhavanti

original: (GBr_1,3.7c) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād imāḥ prajā adantikā jāyante kasmād āsām aparam iva jāyante
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt imāḥ prajāḥ adantikāḥ jāyante kasmāt āsām aparam iva jāyante

original: (GBr_1,3.7d) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād āsāṃ saptavarṣāṣṭavarṣāṇāṃ prabhidyante kasmād āsāṃ punar eva jāyante kasmād antataḥ  #
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt āsām sapta varṣa aṣṭa varṣāṇām prabhidyante kasmāt āsām punar eva jāyante kasmāt antatas

original: (GBr_1,3.7e) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād adhare dantāḥ pūrve jāyante para uttare
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt adhare dantāḥ pūrve jāyante pare uttare

original: (GBr_1,3.7f) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād adhare dantāḥ aṇīyāṃso hrasīyāṃsaḥ prathīyāṃso varṣīyāṃsa uttare
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt adhare dantāḥ aṇīyāṃsaḥ hrasīyāṃsaḥ prathīyāṃsaḥ varṣīyāṃsaḥ uttare

original: (GBr_1,3.7g) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād imau daṃṣṭrau dīrghatarau kasmāt same iva jaṃbhe
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt imau daṃṣṭrau dīrghatarau kasmāt same iva jaṃbhe

original: (GBr_1,3.7h) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād ime śrotre antarataḥ same iva dīrṇe
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt ime śrotre antarataḥ same iva dīrṇe

original: (GBr_1,3.7i) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmāt pumāṃsaḥ śmaśruvanto 'śmaśruvaḥ striyaḥ_
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt pumāṃsaḥ śmaśruvantaḥ a śmaśruvaḥ striyaḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.7j) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād āsāṃ saṃtatam iva śarīraṃ bhavati kasmād āsām asthīni dṛḍhatarāṇīva bhavanti
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt āsām saṃtatam iva śarīram bhavati kasmāt āsām asthīni dṛḍhatarāṇi iva bhavanti

original: (GBr_1,3.7k) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād āsāṃ prathame vayasi retaḥ
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt āsām prathame vayasi retaḥ

original: siktaṃ na saṃbhavati kasmād āsāṃ madhyame vayasi retaḥ siktaṃ saṃbhavati kasmād āsām
analyzed: siktam na saṃbhavati kasmāt āsām madhyame vayasi retaḥ siktam saṃbhavati kasmāt āsām

original: uttame vayasi retaḥ siktaṃ na saṃbhavati
analyzed: uttame vayasi retaḥ siktam na saṃbhavati

original: (GBr_1,3.7l) yas tad darśapūrṇamāsayo rūpaṃ vidyāt kasmād idaṃ śiśnam uccaśa eti nīcī padyate [ed. iṃ]
analyzed: yaḥ tat darśa pūrṇamāsayoḥ rūpam vidyāt kasmāt idam śiśnam uccaśas eti nīcī padyate ā id iṃ

original: (GBr_1,3.8a) atha yaḥ purastād aṣṭāv ājyabhāgān vidyān madhyataḥ pañca havirbhāgāḥ ṣaṭ prājāpatyā upariṣṭād aṣṭāv ājyabhāgān vidyāt_
analyzed: atha yaḥ purastāt aṣṭau ājyabhāgān vidyāt madhyatas pañca haviḥ bhāgāḥ ṣaṭ prājāpatyāḥ upariṣṭāt aṣṭau ājyabhāgān vidyāt

original: (GBr_1,3.8b) atha yo gāyatrīṃ hariṇīṃ jyotiṣpakṣāṃ sarvair yajñair yajamānaṃ svargaṃ lokam abhivahantīṃ vidyāt_
analyzed: atha yaḥ gāyatrīm hariṇīm jyotiṣpakṣām sarvaiḥ yajñaiḥ yajamānam svargam lokam abhivahantīm vidyāt

original: (GBr_1,3.8c) atha yaḥ apaṅktiṃ pañcapadāṃ saptadaśākṣarāṃ sarvair yajñair yajamānaṃ svargaṃ lokam abhivahantīṃ vidyāt
analyzed: atha yaḥ apaṅktim pañca padām saptadaśa akṣarām sarvaiḥ yajñaiḥ yajamānam svargam lokam abhivahantīm vidyāt

original: (GBr_1,3.8d) tasmai ha niṣkaṃ prayacchann uvācānūcāno ha vai svaidāyanāsi suvarṇaṃ vai suvarṇavide dadāmīti
analyzed: tasmai ha niṣkam prayacchan uvāca anūcānaḥ ha vai svaidāyana asi suvarṇam vai suvarṇa vide dadāmi iti

original: (GBr_1,3.8g) taṃ ha papraccha kim eṣa gautamasya putra iti_
analyzed: tam ha papraccha kim eṣa gautamasya putraḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,3.8h) eṣa brahmā brahmāputra iti hovāca yad enaṃ kaś cid upavadetota mīmāṃseta ha vā mūrdhā vā asya vipatet prāṇā vainaṃ jahyur iti
analyzed: eṣa brahmā brahmā aputraḥ iti ha uvāca yat enam kaḥ cit upavadeta uta mīmāṃseta ha vā mūrdhā vai asya vipatet prāṇāḥ vā enam jahyuḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,3.8i) te mitha eva cikrandeyur viprāpavavraja yatretaro babhūva
analyzed: te mithas eva cikrandeyuḥ vipra apavavraja yatra itaraḥ babhūva

original: (GBr_1,3.8j) te prātaḥ samitpāṇaya upodeyur upāyāmo bhavantam iti
analyzed: te prātar samidh pāṇayaḥ upodeyuḥ upāyāmaḥ bhavantam iti

original: (GBr_1,3.8l) yān eva no bhavāṃs tān hyaḥ praśnān apṛcchat tān eva no bhavān vyācakṣīteti
analyzed: yān eva naḥ bhavān tān hyas praśnān apṛcchat tān eva naḥ bhavān vyācakṣīta iti

original: (GBr_1,3.9a) yat purastād vedeḥ prathamaṃ barhi stṛṇāti tasmād imāḥ prajāḥ śirastaḥ prathamaṃ lomaśā jāyante
analyzed: yat purastāt vedeḥ prathamam barhiḥ stṛṇāti tasmāt imāḥ prajāḥ śirastaḥ prathamam lomaśāḥ jāyante

original: (GBr_1,3.9b) yad aparam iva prastaram anuprastṛṇāti tasmād āsām aparam iva śmaśrūṇy upakakṣāṇy anyāni lomāni jāyante
analyzed: yat aparam iva prastaram anuprastṛṇāti tasmāt āsām aparam iva śmaśrūṇi upakakṣāṇi anyāni lomāni jāyante

original: (GBr_1,3.9c) yat prāg barhiṣaḥ prastaram anupraharati tasmād imāḥ prajāḥ śirastaḥ prathamaṃ palitā bhavanti
analyzed: yat prāk barhiṣaḥ prastaram anupraharati tasmāt imāḥ prajāḥ śirastaḥ prathamam palitāḥ bhavanti

original: (GBr_1,3.9d) yad antataḥ sarvam evānupraharati tasmād antataḥ sarva eva palitā bhavanti
analyzed: yat antatas sarvam eva anupraharati tasmāt antatas sarve eva palitāḥ bhavanti

original: (GBr_1,3.9e) yat prayājā apuro'nuvākyāvanto bhavanti tasmād imāḥ prajā adantikā jāyante
analyzed: yat prayājāḥ a puroanuvākyāvantaḥ bhavanti tasmāt imāḥ prajāḥ adantikāḥ jāyante

original: (GBr_1,3.9f) yad dhavīṃṣi puro'nuvākyāvanti bhavanti tasmād āsām aparam iva jāyante
analyzed: yat havīṃṣi puro'nuvākyāvanti bhavanti tasmāt āsām aparam iva jāyante

original: (GBr_1,3.9g) yad anuyājā apuro'nuvākyāvanto bhavanti tasmād āsāṃ saptavarṣāṣṭavarṣāṇāṃ prabhidyante
analyzed: yat anuyājāḥ a puras anuvākyāvantaḥ bhavanti tasmāt āsām sapta varṣa aṣṭa varṣāṇām prabhidyante

original: (GBr_1,3.9h) yat patnīsaṃyājāḥ puro'nuvākyāvanto bhavanti tasmād āsāṃ punar eva jāyante
analyzed: yat patnīsaṃyājāḥ puroanuvākyāvantaḥ bhavanti tasmāt āsām punar eva jāyante

original: (GBr_1,3.9i) yat samiṣṭayajur apuro'nuvākyāvad bhavati tasmād antataḥ sarva eva prabhidyante
analyzed: yat samiṣṭa yajuḥ a puro'nuvākyāvat bhavati tasmāt antatas sarve eva prabhidyante

original: (GBr_1,3.9j) yad gāyatryānūcya triṣṭubhā yajati tasmād adhare dantāḥ pūrve jāyante para uttare
analyzed: yat gāyatryā anūcya triṣṭubhā yajati tasmāt adhare dantāḥ pūrve jāyante pare uttare

original: (GBr_1,3.9k) yad ṛcānūcya yajuṣā yajati tasmād adhare dantā aṇīyāṃso hrasīyāṃsaḥ prathīyāṃso varṣīyāṃsa uttare [ed. varsīyāṃsa]
analyzed: yat ṛcā anūcya yajuṣā yajati tasmāt adhare dantāḥ aṇīyāṃsaḥ hrasīyāṃsaḥ prathīyāṃsaḥ varṣīyāṃsaḥ uttare ā id varsīyāṃsa

original: (GBr_1,3.9l) yad āghārau dīrghatarau prāñcāv āghārayati tasmād imau daṃṣṭrau dīrghatarau
analyzed: yat āghārau dīrghatarau prāñcau āghārayati tasmāt imau daṃṣṭrau dīrghatarau

original: (GBr_1,3.9m) yat saṃyājye sacchandasī tasmāt same iva jambhe
analyzed: yat saṃyājye sat chandasī tasmāt same iva jambhe

analyzed: yat caturthe prayāje samānayati tasmāt ime śrotre antarataḥ same iva dīrṇe

original: (GBr_1,3.9o) yaj japaṃ japitvābhihiṃkṛṇoti tasmāt pumāṃsaḥ śmaśruvanto 'śmaśruva striyaḥ_
analyzed: yat japam japitvā abhihiṃkṛṇoti tasmāt pumāṃsaḥ śmaśruvantaḥ a śmaśruvaḥ striyaḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.9p) yat sāmidhenīḥ saṃtanvann anvāha tasmād āsāṃ saṃtatam iva śarīraṃ bhavati
analyzed: yat sāmidhenīḥ saṃtanvan anvāha tasmāt āsām saṃtatam iva śarīram bhavati

analyzed: yat sāmidhenyaḥ kāṣṭha haviṣaḥ bhavanti tasmāt āsām asthīni dṛḍhatarāṇi iva bhavanti

analyzed: yat prayājāḥ ājya haviṣaḥ bhavanti tasmāt āsām prathame vayasi retaḥ siktam na saṃbhavati

analyzed: yat madhye haviṣām dadhnā ca puroḍāśena ca pracaranti tasmāt āsām madhyame vayasi retaḥ siktam saṃbhavati

analyzed: yat anuyājāḥ ājya haviṣaḥ bhavanti tasmāt āsām uttame vayasi retaḥ siktam na saṃbhavati

analyzed: yat uttame anuyāje sakṛt apāniti tasmāt idam śiśnam uccaśas eti nīcī padyate
yat na apānet sakṛt śūnam syāt
yat muhur apānet sakṛt pannam syāt

analyzed: tasmāt sakṛt apāniti na id sakṛt śūnam syāt sakṛt pannam vā iti

original: (GBr_1,3.10a) atha ye purastād aṣṭāv ājyabhāgāḥ pañca prayājā dvāv āghārau dvāv ājyabhāgāv āgneya ājyabhāgānāṃ prathamaḥ saumyo dvitīyo havirbhāgānām_
analyzed: atha ye purastāt aṣṭau ājya bhāgāḥ pañca prayājāḥ dvau āghārau dvau ājyabhāgau āgneyaḥ ājyabhāgānām prathamaḥ saumyaḥ dvitīyaḥ haviḥ bhāgānām

original: (GBr_1,3.10d) agnīṣomīyaḥ puroḍāśo 'gniḥ sviṣṭakṛd ity ete madhyataḥ pañca havirbhāgāḥ_
analyzed: agnīṣomīyaḥ puroḍāśaḥ agniḥ sviṣṭakṛt iti ete madhyatas pañca haviḥ bhāgāḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.10e) atha ye ṣaṭ prājāpatyā iḍā ca prāśitraṃ ca yac cāgnīdhrāyāvadyati brahmabhāgo yajamānabhāgo 'nvāhārya eva ṣaṣṭhaḥ_
analyzed: atha ye ṣaṭ prājāpatyāḥ iḍā ca prāśitram ca yat ca agnīdhrāya avadyati brahma bhāgaḥ yajamāna bhāgaḥ anvāhāryaḥ eva ṣaṣṭhaḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.10f) atha ya upariṣṭād aṣṭāv ājyabhāgās trayo 'nuyājāś catvāraḥ patnīsaṃyājāḥ samiṣṭayajur aṣṭamam

original: (GBr_1,3.10g) atha yā gāyatrī hariṇī jyotiṣpakṣā sarvair yajñair yajamānaṃ svargaṃ lokam abhivahati vedir eva sā
analyzed: atha yā gāyatrī hariṇī jyotiṣpakṣā sarvaiḥ yajñaiḥ yajamānam svargam lokam abhivahati vediḥ eva sā

analyzed: tasya ye purastāt aṣṭau ājyābhāgāḥ sa dakṣiṇaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.10i) atha ya upariṣṭād aṣṭāv ājyabhāgāḥ sa uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ_ [ed. ipariṣṭād]
analyzed: atha ye upariṣṭāt aṣṭau ājyabhāgāḥ saḥ uttaraḥ pakṣaḥ ā id ipariṣṭāt

analyzed: tat yat ādityam purastāt paryantam na paśyanti tasmāt a jyotiṣkaḥ utkaraḥ bhavati

original: (GBr_1,3.10o) atha yā paṅktiḥ pañcapadā saptadaśākṣarā sarvair yajñair yajamānaṃ svargaṃ lokam abhivahati yājyaiva sā
analyzed: atha yā paṅktiḥ pañca padā saptadaśa akṣarā sarvaiḥ yajñaiḥ yajamānam svargam lokam abhivahati yājyā eva sā
tasyāḥ om śrāvaya iti catur akṣaram
dvi akṣaraḥ vai vaṣaṭkāraḥ sā eṣā paṅktiḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.10u) pañcapadā saptadaśākṣarā sarvair yajñair yajamānaṃ svargaṃ lokam abhivahati
analyzed: pañca padā saptadaśa akṣarā sarvaiḥ yajñaiḥ yajamānam svargam lokam abhivahati

original: (GBr_1,3.10v) tad yatrāsyaiśvaryaṃ syād yatra vainam abhivaheyur evaṃvidam eva tatra brahmāṇaṃ vṛṇīyān nānevaṃvidam iti brāhmaṇam // 10 //
analyzed: tat yatra asya aiśvaryam syāt yatra vā enam abhivaheyuḥ evaṃvidam eva tatra brahmāṇam vṛṇīyāt na anevaṃvidam iti brāhmaṇam  /

original: (GBr_1,3.11a) atha ha prācīnayogya ājagāmāgnihotraṃ bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi gautameti
analyzed: atha ha prācīnayogyaḥ ājagāma agnihotram bhavantam pṛcchāmi gautama iti

original: (GBr_1,3.11ee) kiṃdevatyaṃ hutvā srucaṃ trir udañcam udanaiṣīḥ
analyzed: kiṃdevatyam hutvā srucam tris udañcam udanaiṣīḥ

analyzed: kiṃdevatyam barhiṣi srucam nidhāya unmṛjya uttaratas pāṇī niramārkṣīḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.11gg) kiṃdevatyaṃ dvitīyam unmṛjya pitryupavītaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇataḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhām akārṣīḥ
analyzed: kiṃdevatyam dvitīyam unmṛjya pitryupavītam kṛtvā dakṣiṇatas pitṛbhyaḥ svadhām akārṣīḥ

original: (GBr_1,3.11mm) kiṃdevatyam apareṇāhavanīyam udakaṃ srucā nyanaiṣīḥ [ed. udaka]
analyzed: kiṃdevatyam apareṇa āhavanīyam udakam srucā nyanaiṣīḥ ā id udaka

original: (GBr_1,3.11qq) etac ced vettha gautama hutaṃ te yady u na vetthāhutaṃ ta iti brāhmaṇam // 11 //
analyzed: etat ced vettha gautama hutam te yadi u na vettha a hutam te iti brāhmaṇam
sa ha uvāca raudram me gavīḍayām
dyāvāpṛthivyam hriyamāṇam ā id hriyamāṇam ca uru patyal

original: (GBr_1,3.12z) yāṃ prathamām āhutim ahauṣaṃ mām eva tat svarge loke 'dhām_
analyzed: yām prathamām āhutim ahauṣam mām eva tat svarge loke adhām

original: (GBr_1,3.12aa) yad gārhapatyam avekṣiṣam asya lokasya saṃtatyai
analyzed: yat gārhapatyam avekṣiṣam asya lokasya saṃtatyai

original: (GBr_1,3.12dd) yad dhutvā srucaṃ trir udañcam udanaiṣaṃ rudrāṃs tenāpraiṣam_
analyzed: yat hutvā srucam tris udañcam udanaiṣam rudrān tena apraiṣam

original: (GBr_1,3.12ee) yad barhiṣi srucaṃ nidhāyonmṛjyottarataḥ pāṇī niramārkṣam oṣadhivanaspatīṃs tenāpraiṣam_
analyzed: yat barhiṣi srucam nidhāya unmṛjya uttaratas pāṇī niramārkṣam oṣadhi vanaspatīn tena apraiṣam

original: (GBr_1,3.12ff) yad dvitīyam unmṛjya pitryupavītaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇataḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhām akārṣaṃ pitṝṃs tenāpraiṣam_
analyzed: yat dvitīyam unmṛjya pitryupavītam kṛtvā dakṣiṇatas pitṛbhyaḥ svadhām akārṣam pitṝn tena apraiṣam
yat prathamam prāśiṣam prāṇān tena apraiṣam

original: (GBr_1,3.12jj) yad antataḥ sarvam eva prāśiṣaṃ viśvān devāṃs tenāpraiṣam_
analyzed: yat antatas sarvam eva prāśiṣam viśvān devān tena apraiṣam

original: (GBr_1,3.12kk) yad aprakṣālitayodakaṃ srucā nyanaiṣaṃ sarpetarajanāṃs tenāpraiṣam_
analyzed: yat a prakṣālitayā udakam srucā nyanaiṣam sarpa itarajanān tena apraiṣam

original: (GBr_1,3.12mm) yad apareṇāhavanīyam udakaṃ srucā nyanaiṣaṃ gandharvāpsarasas tenāpraiṣam_
analyzed: yat apareṇa āhavanīyam udakam srucā nyanaiṣam gandharva apsarasaḥ tena apraiṣam

original: (GBr_1,3.12nn) yat sruvaṃ srucaṃ ca pratyatāpsaṃ saptarṣīṃs tenāpraiṣam_
analyzed: yat sruvam srucam ca pratyatāpsam saptarṣīn tena apraiṣam

original: (GBr_1,3.12oo) yad rātrau srugdaṇḍam avāmārkṣaṃ ye rātrau saṃviśanti dakṣiṇāṃs tān udanaiṣam_
analyzed: yat rātrau sruc daṇḍam avāmārkṣam ye rātrau saṃviśanti dakṣiṇān tān udanaiṣam

original: (GBr_1,3.12pp) yat prātar udamārkṣaṃ ye prātaḥ pravrajanti dakṣiṇāṃs tānudanaiṣam iti brāhmaṇam // 12 //
analyzed: yat prātar udamārkṣam ye prātar pravrajanti dakṣiṇān tān udanaiṣam iti brāhmaṇam

original: (GBr_1,3.13a) evam evaitad bho yathā bhavān āha
analyzed: evam eva etat bho yathā bhavān āha

original: (GBr_1,3.13d) yasya sāyam agnaya upasamāhitāḥ syuḥ sarve jvalayeyuḥ prakṣālitāni yajñapātrāṇy upasannāni syur atha ced dakṣiṇāgir udvāyāt kiṃ  #
analyzed: yasya sāyam agnayaḥ upasamāhitāḥ syuḥ sarve jvalayeyuḥ prakṣālitāni yajña pātrāṇi upasannāni syuḥ atha ced dakṣiṇā giḥ udvāyāt kim

original: (GBr_1,3.13e) kṣipram asya patnī praiti yo 'vidvāñ juhoti
analyzed: kṣipram asya patnī praiti yaḥ a vidvān juhoti
vidyayā tu eva aham abhijuhomi iti

original: (GBr_1,3.13g) kā te vidyā kā prāyaścittir iti
analyzed: kā te vidyā kā prāyaścittiḥ iti

original: (GBr_1,3.13h) gārhapatyād adhi dakṣ.iṇāgniṃ praṇīya prāco 'ṅgārān uddhṛtya prāṇāpānābhyaṃ svāheti juhuyāt_
analyzed: gārhapatyāt adhi dakṣiṇāgnim praṇīya prācaḥ aṅgārān uddhṛtya prāṇa apānābhyam svāhā iti juhuyāt

original: (GBr_1,3.13i) atha prātar yathāsthānam agnīn upasāmadhāya yathāpuraṃ juhuyāt
analyzed: atha prātar yathāsthānam agnīn yathāpuram juhuyāt

saḥ agniṣṭomena iṣṭvā antam eva apaśyat

sa vājapeyena iṣṭvā samrāj iti nāma ādhatta

analyzed: sa yaḥ evam etām saṃvatsare yajñakratūnām apītim veda yajñena sa ātmā sa lokaḥ bhūtvā devān api eti iti brāhmaṇam  /

analyzed: trivṛt eva bhargaḥ pañcadaśaḥ eva mahaḥ saptadaśaḥ eva yaśaḥ ekaviṃśaḥ eva sarvam

analyzed: ṛgvedaḥ eva bhargaḥ yajurvedaḥ eva mahaḥ sāmavedaḥ eva yaśaḥ brahmavedaḥ eva sarvam

original: (GBr_2,1.10f) yat paśyaty anyāṃ nānyāṃ tan mithunam_
analyzed: yat paśyati anyām na anyām tat mithunam

original: (GBr_2,1.10g) yad amāvāsyāyāś candramā adhi prajāyate tan mithunam_
analyzed: yat amāvāsyāyāḥ candramāḥ adhi prajāyate tat mithunam
tasmāt eva asmai mithunāt paśūn prajanayati  /
yat pūrvayā saṃprati yateta uttarayā chambaṭkuryāt

original: (GBr_2,1.11c) yad uttarayā saṃprati yajeta pūrvayā chambaṭkuryāt_
analyzed: yat uttarayā saṃprati yajeta pūrvayā chambaṭkuryāt
yajña mukham eva pūrvayā ālabhate yajate uttarayā
devatāḥ evam pūrvayā āpnoti indriyam uttaryā

original: (GBr_2,1.11k) devalokam eva pūrvayāvarunddhe manuṣyalokam uttarayā bhūyaso yajñakratūn upaitya_
analyzed: deva lokam eva pūrvayā avarunddhe manuṣya lokam uttarayā bhūyasaḥ yajñakratūn upaitya
eṣā ha vai sumanā nāma iṣṭiḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.11m) yam adyejānaṃ paścāc candramā abhyudiyād asmā asmiṃl loka ārdhukaṃ bhavati // 11 //
analyzed: yam adya ījānam paścāt candramāḥ abhyudiyāt asmai asmin loke ārdhukam bhavati  /
agnāvaiṣṇavam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet darśa pūrṇamāsau āripsamāṇaḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.12b) agnir vai sarvā devatā viṣṇur yajñaḥ_
analyzed: agniḥ vai sarvāḥ devatāḥ viṣṇuḥ yajñaḥ
devatāḥ ca eva yajñam ca ārabhate ṛddhyai

original: (GBr_2,1.12f) udin nu śṛṅge sito mucyata iti
analyzed: udit nu śṛṅge sitaḥ mucyate iti

original: (GBr_2,1.12g) darśo vā etayoḥ pūrvaḥ paurṇamāsa uttaraḥ_
analyzed: darśaḥ vai etayoḥ pūrvaḥ paurṇamāsaḥ uttaraḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.12h) atha yat parastāt paurṇamāsa ārabhyate tad yathā pūrvaṃ kriyate
analyzed: atha yat parastāt paurṇamāsaḥ ārabhyate tat yathā pūrvam kriyate

original: (GBr_2,1.12i) tad yat paurṇamāsam ārabhamāṇaḥ sarasvatyai caruṃ nirvapet sarasvate dvādaśakapālam amāvāsyā vai sarasvatī paurṇamāsaḥ sarasvān
analyzed: tat yat paurṇamāsam ārabhamāṇaḥ sarasvatyai carum nirvapet sarasvate dvādaśa kapālam amāvāsyā vai sarasvatī paurṇamāsaḥ sarasvān
ubhau eva enau saha ārabhate ṛddhyai

original: (GBr_2,1.13a) agnaye pathikṛte 'ṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped yasya prajñāteṣṭir atipadyate
analyzed: agnaye pathikṛte aṣṭākapālam nirvapet yasya prajñātā iṣṭiḥ atipadyate

original: (GBr_2,1.13b) bahiṣpathaṃ vā eṣa eti yasya prajñāteṣṭir atipadyate_
analyzed: bahiṣpatham vai eṣaḥ eti yasya prajñātā iṣṭiḥ atipadyate

original: (GBr_2,1.14a) agnaye vratapataye 'ṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped ya āhitāgniḥ san pravaset_
analyzed: agnaye vratapataye aṣṭākapālam nirvapet yaḥ āhitāgniḥ san pravaset

original: (GBr_2,1.14b) bahu vā eṣa vratam atipātayati ya āhitāgniḥ san pravasati vratye 'hani striyaṃ vopaiti māṃsaṃ vāśnāti_
analyzed: bahu vai eṣa vratam atipātayati yaḥ āhitāgniḥ san pravasati vratye ahani striyam vā upaiti māṃsam vā aśnāti

original: (GBr_2,1.15a) agnaye vratabhṛte 'ṣṭākapālaṃ nirvaped ya āhitāgnir ārtijam aśru kuryāt_
analyzed: agnaye vrata bhṛte aṣṭākapālam nirvapet yaḥ āhitāgniḥ ārti jam aśru kuryāt

original: (GBr_2,1.15b) ānīto vā eṣa devānāṃ ya āhitāgnis
analyzed: ānītaḥ vai eṣa devānām yaḥ āhitāgniḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.16a) aindrāgnam usram anusṛṣṭam ālabheta yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somaṃ na pibet_
analyzed: aindrāgnam usram anusṛṣṭam ālabheta yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somam na pibet

original: (GBr_2,1.16b) indriyeṇa vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somaṃ na pibati
analyzed: indriyeṇa vai eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somam na pibati

original: (GBr_2,1.16c) yad aindra indriyeṇaivainaṃ tad vīryeṇa samardhayati
analyzed: yat aindraḥ indriyeṇa eva enam tat vīryeṇa samardhayati

original: (GBr_2,1.16d) devatābhir vā eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yasya pitā pitāmhaḥ somaṃ na pibati
analyzed: devatābhiḥ vai eṣa vīryeṇa vyṛdhyate yasya pitā pitāmhaḥ somam na pibati
yat āgneyaḥ agniḥ vai sarvāḥ devatāḥ
sarvābhiḥ eva enam tat devatābhiḥ samardhayati

original: (GBr_2,1.16h) anusṛṣṭa iva hy etasya somapītho yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somaṃ na pibati
analyzed: anusṛṣṭaḥ iva hi etasya soma pīthaḥ yasya pitā pitāmahaḥ somam na pibati

original: (GBr_2,1.16i) tasmād eṣa eva tasyā devatāyāḥ paśūnāṃ samṛddhaḥ // 16 //
analyzed: tasmāt eṣaḥ eva tasyāḥ devatāyāḥ paśūnām samṛddhaḥ  /

original: (GBr_2,1.17a) devā vā oṣadhīṣu pakvāsv ājim ayuḥ
analyzed: devāḥ vai oṣadhīṣu pakvāsu ājim ayuḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.17b) sa indro 'ved agnir vāvemāḥ prathama ujjeṣyatīti
analyzed: saḥ indraḥ avet agniḥ vāva imāḥ prathamaḥ ujjeṣyati iti

original: (GBr_2,1.17c) so 'bravīd yataro nau pūrva ujjayāt tan nau saheti
analyzed: saḥ abravīt yataraḥ nau pūrvaḥ ujjayāt tat nau saha iti

original: (GBr_2,1.17g) ekā vai tarhi yavasya śnuṣṭir āsīd ekā vrīher ekā māṣasyaikā tilasya
analyzed: ekā vai tarhi yavasya śnuṣṭiḥ āsīt ekā vrīheḥ ekā māṣasya ekā tilasya

original: (GBr_2,1.17h) tad viśve devā abruvan vayaṃ vā etat prathayiṣyāmo bhāgo no 'stv iti
analyzed: tat viśve devāḥ abruvan vayam vai etat prathayiṣyāmaḥ bhāgaḥ naḥ astu iti

original: (GBr_2,1.17m) athemāv abrūtāṃ na vā ṛta āvābhyām evaitad yūyaṃ prathayata mayi pratiṣṭhitam asau vṛṣṭyā pacati naitadito 'bhyujjeṣyatīti
analyzed: atha imau abrūtām na vai ṛte āvābhyām eva etat yūyam prathayata mayi pratiṣṭhitam asau vṛṣṭyā pacati na etat itas abhyujjeṣyati iti

original: (GBr_2,1.17o) tābhyāṃ vā eṣa bhāgaḥ kriyata ujjityā eva_
analyzed: tābhyām vai eṣa bhāgaḥ kriyate ujjityai eva
atha u pratiṣṭhityai eva yaḥ dyāvāpṛthivīyaḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.17s) yāś ca grāmyā yāścāraṇyās tāsām eṣa uddhāro yac chyāmākaḥ_
analyzed: yāḥ ca grāmyāḥ yāḥ ca āraṇyāḥ tāsām eṣaḥ uddhāraḥ yat śyāmākaḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.17t) yac chyāmākaḥ saumyas tam eva bhāginaṃ kṛṇute
analyzed: yat śyāmākaḥ saumyaḥ tam eva bhāginam kṛṇute

original: (GBr_2,1.17u) yad akṛtvāgrayaṇaṃ navasyāśnīyād devānāṃ bhāgaṃ pratikḷptam adyāt
analyzed: yat a kṛtvā āgrayaṇam navasya aśnīyāt devānām bhāgam pratikḷptam adyāt

original: (GBr_2,1.17v) saṃvatsarād vā etad adhiprajāyate yad āgrayaṇam_
analyzed: saṃvatsarāt vai etat adhiprajāyate yat āgrayaṇam
tasmāt brahmā purastāddhoma saṃsthita homeṣu āvapeta
retaḥ eva hi eṣaḥ a prajātaḥ
etena ha vai indraḥ asurān pratyajayat ā id asurān

original: (GBr_2,1.18c) aprati ha bhavaty etena yajamāno bhrātṛvyaṃ jayati
analyzed: aprati ha bhavati etena yajamānaḥ bhrātṛvyam jayati

original: (GBr_2,1.18e) etena ha vai bharadvājaḥ pratardanaṃ samanahyat
analyzed: etena ha vai bharadvājaḥ pratardanam samanahyat

original: (GBr_2,1.18g) yaṃ kāmayeta rāṣṭrī syād iti tam etena saṃnahyet_
analyzed: yam kāmayeta rāṣṭrī syāt iti tam etena saṃnahyet

original: (GBr_2,1.18i) etena ha vā indro virājam abhyajayat_
analyzed: etena ha vai indraḥ virājam abhyajayat

original: (GBr_2,1.18k) daśākṣarā virāḍ vairājaṃ vā etena yajamāno bhrātṛvyaṃ vṛṅkte
analyzed: daśa akṣarā virāj vairājam vai etena yajamānaḥ bhrātṛvyam vṛṅkte
tat u ha eke ekādaśa anvāhuḥ
ekādaśa akṣarā vai triṣṭubh traiṣṭubhaḥ vajraḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.18o) dakṣiṇato vai devānāṃ yajñaṃ rakṣāṃsy ajighāṃsan_
analyzed: dakṣiṇatas vai devānām yajñam rakṣāṃsi ajighāṃsan

original: (GBr_2,1.18r) yad brahmāpratirathaṃ japann eti yajñasyābhijityai rakṣasām apahatyai rakṣasām apahatyai // 18 //
analyzed: yat brahmā apratiratham japan eti yajñasya abhijityai rakṣasām apahatyai rakṣasām apahatyai

original: (GBr_2,1.19c) mukhaṃ vā etat saṃvatsarasya yat phālgunī paurṇamāsī mukham uttare phālgunyau pucchaṃ pūrve [ed. pūrva]
analyzed: mukham vai etat saṃvatsarasya yat phālgunī paurṇamāsī mukham uttare phālgunyau puccham pūrve ā id pūrva

original: (GBr_2,1.19d) tad yathā pravṛttasyāntau sametau syātām evam evaitat saṃvatsarasyāntau sametau bhavatas
analyzed: tat yathā pravṛttasya antau sametau syātām evam eva etat saṃvatsarasya antau sametau bhavataḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.19e) tad yat phālgunyāṃ paurṇamāsyāṃ cāturmāsyair yajate mukhata evaitat saṃvatsaraṃ prayuṅkte_
analyzed: tat yat phālgunyām paurṇamāsyām cāturmāsyaiḥ yajate mukhataḥ eva etat saṃvatsaram prayuṅkte

original: (GBr_2,1.19f) atho bhaiṣajyayajñā vā ete yac cāturmāsyāni
analyzed: atha u bhaiṣajya yajñāḥ vai ete yat cāturmāsyāni

original: (GBr_2,1.19j) aṣṭau vai catasṛṇāṃ paurṇamāsīnāṃ havīṃṣi bhavanti
analyzed: aṣṭau vai catasṛṇām paurṇamāsīnām havīṃṣi bhavanti

original: (GBr_2,1.19l) atha yad agniṃ manthanti prajāpatir vai vaiśvadevam_
analyzed: atha yat agnim manthanti prajāpatiḥ vai vaiśvadevam

original: (GBr_2,1.19o) atha yat saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ saptadaśo vai prajāpatiḥ
analyzed: atha yat saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ saptadaśaḥ vai prajāpatiḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.19q) atha yat sadvantāv ājyabhāgāv asisaṃtīti vai sadvantau bhavataḥ_
analyzed: atha yat sadvantau ājyabhāgau vai sadvantau bhavataḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.19r) atha yad virājau saṃyājye annaṃ vai śrīr virāḍ annādyasya śriyo 'varuddhyai_ [ed. 'varuddhyā 'tha]
analyzed: atha yat virājau saṃyājye annam vai śrīḥ virāj annādyasya śriyaḥ avaruddhyai ā id avaruddhyai atha

original: (GBr_2,1.19s) atha yan nava prayājā navānuyājā aṣṭau havīṃṣi vājinaṃ navamaṃ tan nakṣatrīyāṃ virājam āpnoti_
analyzed: atha yat nava prayājāḥ nava anuyājāḥ aṣṭau havīṃṣi vājinam navamam tat nakṣatrīyām virājam āpnoti

original: (GBr_2,1.19t) atho āhur daśanīṃ virājam iti prayājānuyājā havīṃṣy āghārāv ājyabhāgāv iti // 19 //
analyzed: atha u āhuḥ daśanīm virājam iti prayāja anuyājāḥ havīṃṣi āghārau ājyabhāgau iti

original: (GBr_2,1.20a) atha yad agnīṣomau prathamaṃ devatānāṃ yajaty agnīṣomau vai devānāṃ mukham_
analyzed: atha yat agnīṣomau prathamam devatānām yajati agnīṣomau vai devānām mukham

original: (GBr_2,1.20c) atha yat savitāraṃ yajaty asau vai savitā yo 'sau tapati_
analyzed: atha yat savitāram yajati asau vai savitā yaḥ asau tapati

original: (GBr_2,1.20e) atha yat sarasvatīṃ yajati vāg vai sarasvatī
analyzed: atha yat sarasvatīm yajati vāc vai sarasvatī

original: (GBr_2,1.20g) atha yan pūṣaṇaṃ yajaty asau vai pūṣā yo 'sau tapati_
analyzed: atha yan pūṣaṇam yajati asau vai pūṣā yaḥ asau tapati

original: (GBr_2,1.20i) atha yan marutaḥ svatavaso yajati ghorā vai marutaḥ svatavasas
analyzed: atha yat marutaḥ svatavasaḥ yajati ghorāḥ vai marutaḥ svatavasaḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.20k) atha yad viśvān devān yajaty ete vai viśve devā yat sarve devās
analyzed: atha yat viśvān devān yajati ete vai viśve devāḥ yat sarve devāḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.20m) atha yad dyāvāpṛthivyau yajati pratiṣṭhe vai dyāvāpṛthivyau
analyzed: atha yat dyāvāpṛthivyau yajati pratiṣṭhe vai dyāvāpṛthivyau

original: (GBr_2,1.20o) atha yad vājino yajati paśavo vai vājinaḥ
analyzed: atha yat vājinaḥ yajati paśavaḥ vai vājinaḥ
atha u deva aśvāḥ vai vājinaḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.20v) atra devāḥ sāśvā abhīṣṭāḥ prītā bhavanti_
analyzed: atra devāḥ sa aśvāḥ abhīṣṭāḥ prītāḥ bhavanti

original: (GBr_2,1.20w) atha yat parastāt paurṇamāsena yajate tathā hāsya pūrvapakṣe vaiśvadeveneṣṭaṃ bhavati // 20 //
analyzed: atha yat parastāt paurṇamāsena yajate tathā ha asya pūrvapakṣe vaiśvadevena iṣṭam bhavati  /

original: (GBr_2,1.21b) tāḥ sṛṣṭā aprasūtā varuṇasya yavāñ jakṣus
analyzed: tāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ a prasūtāḥ varuṇasya jakṣuḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.21d) tāḥ prajāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitaram etyopāvadann upa taṃ yajñakratuṃ jānīhi yeneṣṭvā varuṇam aprīṇāt
analyzed: tāḥ prajāḥ prajāpatim pitaram etya upāvadan upa tam yajña kratum jānīhi yena iṣṭvā varuṇam aprīṇāt

original: (GBr_2,1.21f) varuṇapāśebhyaḥ sarvasmāc ca pāpmanaḥ saṃpramucyanta iti
analyzed: varuṇa pāśebhyaḥ sarvasmāt ca pāpmanaḥ saṃpramucyante iti

original: (GBr_2,1.21g) tata etaṃ prajāpatir yajñakratum apaśyad varuṇapraghāsān_
analyzed: tatas etam prajāpatiḥ yajña kratum apaśyat varuṇapraghāsān

original: (GBr_2,1.21k) sa prīto varuṇo varuṇapāśebhyaḥ sarvasmāc ca pāpmanaḥ prajāḥ prāmuñcat
analyzed: sa prītaḥ varuṇaḥ varuṇa pāśebhyaḥ sarvasmāt ca pāpmanaḥ prajāḥ prāmuñcat

original: (GBr_2,1.21l) pra ha vā etasya prajā varuṇapāśebhyaḥ sarvasmāc ca pāpmano mucyante
analyzed: pra ha vai etasya prajāḥ varuṇa pāśebhyaḥ sarvasmāt ca pāpmanaḥ mucyante

original: (GBr_2,1.21n) atha yad agniṃ praṇayanti yam evāmuṃ vaiśvadeve manthanti tam eva tat praṇayanti
analyzed: atha yat agnim praṇayanti yam eva amum vaiśvadeve manthanti tam eva tat praṇayanti

original: (GBr_2,1.21p) atha yat saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ sadvantāv ājyabhāgau virājau saṃyājye teṣām uktaṃ brāhmaṇam
analyzed: atha yat saptadaśa sāmidhenyaḥ sadvantau ājyabhāgau virājau saṃyājye teṣām uktam brāhmaṇam

original: (GBr_2,1.21q) atha yan nava prayājā navānuyājā navaitāni havīṃṣi
analyzed: atha yat nava prayājāḥ nava anuyājāḥ nava etāni havīṃṣi

original: (GBr_2,1.21r) samānāni tv eva pañca saṃcarāṇi havīṃṣi bhavanti pauṣṇāntāni
analyzed: samānāni tu eva pañca saṃcarāṇi havīṃṣi bhavanti pauṣṇa antāni

original: (GBr_2,1.22a) atha yad aindrāgno dvādaśakapālo bhavati balaṃ vai teja indrāgnī
analyzed: atha yat aindrāgnaḥ dvādaśa kapālaḥ bhavati balam vai tejaḥ indra agnī

original: (GBr_2,1.22c) atha yad vāruṇy āmikṣendro vai varuṇaḥ [ed. āmīkṣendro, corr. Patyal]
analyzed: atha yat vāruṇī āmikṣā indraḥ vai varuṇaḥ ā id āmīkṣā indra
tasmāt vāruṇī āmikṣā ā id amikṣā

original: (GBr_2,1.22f) atha yan mārutī payasyāpsu vai marutaḥ śritāḥ_ [ed. śritaḥ. corr. Patyal]
analyzed: atha yat mārutī payasyā apsu vai marutaḥ śritāḥ e t śritaḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.22h) athendrasya vai marutaḥ śrita aindraṃ payas
analyzed: atha indrasya vai marutaḥ śritaḥ aindram payaḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.22j) atha yat kāya ekakapālaḥ prajāpatir vai kaḥ
analyzed: atha yat kāyaḥ eka kapālaḥ prajāpatiḥ vai kaḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.22l) atho sukhasya vā etan nāmadheyaṃ kam iti [ed. nāmagheyam]
analyzed: atha u sukhasya vai etat nāmadheyam kam iti ā id nāmagheyam

original: (GBr_2,1.22m) sukham eva tad adhy ātman dhatte_
analyzed: sukham eva tat adhi ātman dhatte

original: (GBr_2,1.22n) atha yan mithunau gāvau dadāti tat prajātyai rūpam
analyzed: atha yat mithunau gāvau dadāti tat prajātyai rūpam

original: (GBr_2,1.22p) atha yad apsu varuṇaṃ yajati sva evainaṃ tad āyatane prīṇāti_
analyzed: atha yat apsu varuṇam yajati sve eva enam tat āyatane prīṇāti

original: (GBr_2,1.22q) atha yat parastāt paurṇamāsena yajate tathā hāsya pūrvapakṣe varuṇapraghāsair iṣṭaṃ bhavati // 22 //
analyzed: atha yat parastāt paurṇamāsena yajate tathā ha asya pūrvapakṣe varuṇapraghāsaiḥ iṣṭam bhavati  /

original: (GBr_2,1.23a) aindro vā eṣa yajñakratur yat sākamedhās
analyzed: aindraḥ vai eṣa yajña kratuḥ yat sākamedhāḥ

original: (GBr_2,1.23b) tad yathā mahārājaḥ purastāt senānīkāni vyuhyābhayaṃ panthānam anviyād evam evaitat purastād devatā yajati [ed. sainānīkāni,
analyzed: tat yathā mahā rājaḥ purastāt senā anīkāni vyuhya abhayam panthānam anviyāt evam eva etat purastāt devatāḥ yajati ā id sainānīkāni

original: (GBr_2,1.23d) atha yad agnim anīkavantaṃ prathamaṃ devatānāṃ yajaty agnir vai devānāṃ mukham_
